items.sentence: You should call your mother as soon as possible.
You should obey the traffic laws when you drive.
You should put aside some money for a rainy day.
Tom reminds me of someone I went to school with.
Tom returned the shirt because it was too small.
Tom rushed into his office and slammed the door.
Tom said doing that was harder than he expected.
I\'ve heard that French is a difficult language.
I\'ve never eaten anything as delicious as this.
I\'ve never known anyone as hypocritical as you.
